A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a dis-service to the previous seven movies that preceded it. For a movie that is a sequel and part of a Trilogy\, it doesn't follow up or expand upon building up the major plot points introduced in the previous episode; it takes all the momentum and the major plot points of interest and ends them rather abruptly - basically taking the best of the previous movie and treating it as throw away garbage.
